last_episode_to_air.name: Fear Itself
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ollie commits to giving up alcohol, and the gang support him by agreeing to overcome one of their own fears.

name: Coming of Age
overview: A frank look into the outrageous world of a group of sixth form students living in Abingdon as they enjoy a final romp with adolescence.

episodes.name: B... low Job
episodes.overview: DK fancies Sky, but will his unusual seduction techniques - a mix of chocolate, rap and breakdancing - succeed? Meanwhile, it's essay time, and Matt steals Chloe's essay to make sure he gets a good grade.

episodes.name: Dick and Fanny
episodes.overview: Matt and Chloe are in the school play together and have to kiss. Chloe is excited, but Matt's nerves get the better of him.

episodes.name: I Suck Coppers
episodes.overview: Driving home from an impromtu party in Chloe's bedroom, DK gets pulled over by a policeman. He tries to avoid being done for drink-driving by swallowing a load of copper coins. When bits of his body start going green, DK is delighted - at last he's got something truly special to show the girls. Chloe agrees to go out with Matt, but only if he starts eating a healthy diet.

episodes.name: We Have Been Naughty Haven't We?
episodes.overview: Jas dumps Ollie after a blazing row and then seizes the opportunity to get back at him by offering his best friend, Matt, what he desperately wants - pity sex.

episodes.name: Up the Botty
episodes.overview: Jas is desperate to experiment sexually in Ollie's mother's bed while she is out at work.

episodes.name: Pussy Boy
episodes.overview: Chloe decides she is ready to have sex with Matt, just as long as her parents approve.

episodes.name: Rudies
episodes.overview: Ollie refuses to get a tetanus jab after falling on a nail. DK causes havoc with a ventriloquist's doll and Chloe demands Matt makes amends for blabbing about their sex life.

episodes.name: Who Killed Alec the Dwarf?
episodes.overview: The gang decide to perform a radio play for their general studies course, written and directed by Ollie. However, the power goes to his head and he ends up sacking them hours before it's about to go on air. Can Matt save the day?

episodes.name: French Rs
episodes.overview: DK gets a job as a nude life model. Chloe and Matt decide to spice up their sex life. Ollie falls in love with the new French teacher, driving Jas mad with envy and into the arms of another man. The music played by the principal is "Congratulations" by Cliff Richard.

episodes.name: Black Eye
episodes.overview: In a series of flashbacks, DK explains to the principal how he got his black eye. In the meantime, the friends pull together to stop Ollie discovering Jas's slip up with Horace.

episodes.name: Lederhosen Hero
episodes.overview: Chloe is enraged after she and Matt are turned away from the cinema when they attempt to see Sex Fart 3. Ollie and Jas decide to find a new common interest that doesn't involve sex, and DK is suffering from dreams about the Principal.

episodes.name: Doreen
episodes.overview: DK makes friends with Doreen, a delinquent pensioner with a penchant for kissing strangers and blowing up ducks. Chloe handcuffs a warring Ollie and Jas and refuses to set them free until they make friends. Matt tries to learn all he can about Chloe in 24 hours.

episodes.name: Monster
episodes.overview: Ollie has chest pains which he thinks are the result of his split with Jas. The principal is replaced by the monstrous Captain Gannet. Chloe and DK hatch a plan to restore order to Wooton College.

episodes.name: Live or Die
episodes.overview: Ollie visits purgatory, where an angel disguised as DK offers him the chance to live, die or simply cease to exist at all. The rest of the gang huddle round his hospital bed waiting to see if he'll awake from his coma.

episodes.name: Kissy Woo!
episodes.overview: Matt has made a new friend, Robyn Crisp. How will Chloe and the rest of the gang take to a new addition to their group?

episodes.name: Badvert
episodes.overview: The principal holds a competition in which the students must make an advert for the college, to help boost flagging enrollment.

episodes.name: My Idiot Bf
episodes.overview: Ollie bares his bottom art to the world, while DK's poker-playing dad Jim asks his trusting son for a favour.

episodes.name: Robbery
episodes.overview: The gang are on hand to help DK get his mum's engagement ring back, which involves robbing the local pawn shop.

episodes.name: Dib Dib Dib
episodes.overview: Mr Palmer signs DK up to his scouting group for boys. As Jas launches her modelling career, Ollie is scared he'll lose her.

episodes.name: Penguin
episodes.overview: Following Matt and Chloe's break-up, Chloe is at a loss while Matt finds himself caught up in a gang who love nothing more than gentle humour. Ollie's foul-mouthed Aunty Olwen has come to stay with him, much to Jas's concern. And DK finds a gun.

episodes.name: Lesbian Jumper
episodes.overview: Love is in the air as Matt develops quite a penchant for older women. Can a romance with Vera, a 70-year-old cleaner, really last? DK and Robyn are off to a lesbian bar in an attempt to get Robyn into the gay dating scene, thought it seems DK is more popular with the ladies than he thought.

episodes.name: Fear Itself
episodes.overview: Ollie commits to giving up alcohol, and the gang support him by agreeing to overcome one of their own fears.
